page.title: 12HOSPITAL CARE IN SUTTON IN A
page.content: {King's Mill}is the only hospital,of 490 beds.It is the main maternity hospital.Most of the births for Mansfield,Ashfield and outlying areas take place at the Dukeries Maternity Centre.There are 4 opticians,2 dental surgeries (4 dentists),1 speech therapist,1 school nurse.There are three surgeries with 14 doctors. {Three Days in Hospital.}On a Wednesday morning,I woke up and had pains.My Mum called the doctor and he said,"Go to the hospital."I arrived at 11.20a.m.I was in Blandy Ward.Several doctors came to see me before the operation at 4.00p.m.Next day I couldn't eat at all so I was hungry.I had my arm in a sling,with a tube running from a bag into my arm,which was feeding me.On Friday,I was excited,my arm was free at last.I read for a bit,the doctors came and I went home.ANDREW SLACK.
